entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
